subject: Real Estate
title: Quiet Title Actions
description: Learn Quiet Title Actions in one minute.

hook.text: A cloud on your title means someone out there might claim your property. A quiet title action silences them.

buildup.text: Courts use quiet title actions to resolve ownership disputes and clear defects from the public record.

discovery.text: Common triggers include old liens, conflicting wills, and breaks in the chain of recorded ownership.

twist.text: Some properties in the South still have title clouds from the Civil War era â€” unresolved for 160 years.

climax.text: A quiet title action makes the record clean, giving future buyers confidence that ownership is undisputed.

punchline.text: Sometimes you need a court to prove what you already own.
